lexUnit.name: freeze.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: keep or stop at a fixed level or in a fixed state.

sentence.text: The results could have been disastrous for the force which has already had to freeze recruitment of officers during 1993 to keep within a tight budget .
He says : ` Already , in order to achieve a balanced budget , it has been necessary to freeze recruitment during 1993 of all police officer posts as and when they come vacant .

1972 - U.S. Senate approves U.S.-Soviet agreement to freeze major part of their offensive nuclear arsenals for five years .
